description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. This is a game of a cat fighter wielding a sword of light.Press and hold the A button, which keeps the sword of light ready for the cat.You can call up enemies by pressing the X button.Aim for as high score as possible within the time limit.
description.short: This is a game of a cat fighter wielding a sword of light.Press and hold the A button, which keeps the sword of light ready for the cat.You can call up enemies by pressing the X button.Aim for as high score as possible within the time limit.
